name: who-is-hiring-dashboard
description: Dashboard for Ask HN: Who is hiring?
author: Robert Hall <langbert@gmail.com> (http://arxpoetica.com/)

scripts.cleanup: if [ -d node_modules ]; then rm -rf node_modules; fi && if [ -d .svelte-kit ]; then rm -rf .svelte-kit; fi && if [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml; fi && pnpm install
